description: Griffin Technology PowerJolt  2.1  amp Power Charger for iPad, iPhone and iPod  is essential for iPad, iPhone, and iPod.  Griffin’s PowerJolt sports a low-profile cigarette-lighter adapter and a powerful 2-amp charging circuit so your iPad, iPhone, or iPod can power up quickly and safely. Connect your device with the included dock cable to charge.  LED shows when PowerJolt is properly connected. With its built-in, self-resetting SmartFuse, PowerJolt protects as it charges.
title: Griffin Technology PowerJolt 2.1 amp Power Charger for iPad, iPhone and iPod (Black)
